mapper.select:
SELECT C.CODER_ID,A.TABLE_NAME, B.COMMENTS AS TABLE_COMMENT, NVL(C.CODER_FLAG,'0') AS CODER_FLAG,TITLE,MODEL_NAME,MODEL_NAME_CN, PACKAGE_NAME,CLASS_NAME,FUNCTION_NAME FROM USER_TABLES A, USER_TAB_COMMENTS B, (SELECT CODER_ID,TITLE,MODEL_NAME,MODEL_NAME_CN, PACKAGE_NAME,CLASS_NAME,FUNCTION_NAME,TABLE_NAME,TABLE_COMMENT , '1' AS CODER_FLAG FROM SYS_CODER) C WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME(+) AND A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME(+)
AND A.TABLE_NAME
${operators.tableName} =
upper(#{variables.tableName})
AND B.COMMENTS LIKE LIKED(#{variables.tableComment})
AND NVL (C.CODER_FLAG, '0') = #{variables.coderFlag}
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME
